description.value: An elder tempest rains terror down on the land below, and sometimes leave behind trace amounts of its elemental energy. It is possible to harness this energy using an enchanted bottle to collect some of the elder tempest's essence. Requires an enchanted vial. The essence may be used to craft a powerful staff. Harvesting note: 25 DC if the elder tempest disperses over 20 feet above the ground (spreading its essence into a wider area, making it more difficult to find).
